channel.title: [PI] Can't buy Items?
channel.description:
Hello people,
I have added some shops to my new server[PI based] But, i can't buy any stuff from the shops. Just in this shops i can't buy.
Please respond!

item.title: [PI] Can't buy Items?
item.dc:creator: @Rickrolla Rickrolla
item.description:
@Rickrolla wrote:

  1. Yes, they are both on 2
  2. I’ve created new shops so that can’t be the point, besides, there are 2 shops, maybe unlucky if both are Points as payment.

Got any other ideas?

Read full topic

what ID does the shop have?
when you try to bu somthing , does it say you need points?

item.title: [PI] Can't buy Items?
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

The problem is in Shops.cfg for the shop after the shop name you shoul have two 2’s its probably that.
